humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the report, there is metastatic carcinoma in 1 out of 12 axillary lymph nodes (1/12). Based on the AJCC staging system, this corresponds to N1. This is further supported by New Rule 12, which states that N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma to one lymph node (1/1) and micrometastatic carcinoma (0.21 mm) to 1 of 12 axillary lymph nodes (1/12). This corresponds to pathologic N1 stage based on the AJCC staging system.
